The plant produces small, greenish-white flowers that are clustered in dense inflorescences. It is native to arid and semi-arid regions of Africa and is adapted to survive in harsh, dry environments. Due to its specialized morphology and ecological adaptations, it is of interest to botanists and horticulturists alike.
